definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: You have more power than you can po ssibly imagine.
sentences.chinese: 你的能耐比你所能想象到的要大得多。

sentences.english: How much tension can this piece of paper endure?
sentences.chinese: 這張紙到底能耐得住多大的力量呢？

sentences.english: Because only I have the ability.
sentences.chinese: 因爲只有我纔有那能耐。

sentences.english: Are you able to sit through the play?
sentences.chinese: 你能耐着性子看完戲嗎？

sentences.english: But the ability of the central government to keep its banks afloat is not the end of the story.
sentences.chinese: 但中央政府托起這些銀行的能耐並非故事的結局。

sentences.english: Monel metal is resistant to both fresh and salt water corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 莫耐爾合金能耐淡水和鹽水的腐蝕。

sentences.english: He knew better men than he had tried.
sentences.chinese: 他知道曾有比他更有能耐的人嘗試過。

sentences.english: Applicable to weak base, weak acid, oli, especially resistant to abrasive medium.
sentences.chinese: 適用於弱鹼，弱酸，油類，尤其能耐研磨性介質。

sentences.english: Obviously human hearts can't do that.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯，人類心臟沒這種能耐。

sentences.english: I have all the capability to fight on, buy a taxi.
sentences.chinese: 我把所有的能耐都拼上了，買了一輛出租車。

sentences.english: If you were in his shoes, what could you do?
sentences.chinese: 都說李鴻章賣國，可他又有什麼能耐呢？

sentences.english: Money does not have the power in and of itself to make you happy or unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 錢本身其實並沒有那麼大的能耐讓你快樂或者不快樂。

sentences.english: Bran did not try to follow. His pony could not keep up.
sentences.chinese: 布蘭沒有跟上去，他的小馬沒這般能耐。

sentences.english: Not even death can rob me of my will, leave alone the poverty.
sentences.chinese: 死猶未肯輸心去，貧亦豈能耐我何。

sentences.english: You might be surprised at what your body is capable of after reading these facts.
sentences.chinese: 看完這些事實，你大概會對你身體的能耐感到驚訝。

sentences.english: The Air element of Gemini brings communication, inshoutect or speed.
sentences.chinese: 風向性格的特質讓雙子座具有溝通能耐，智慧和速讀。

definition: a couple of times/to repeat the same/the same old trick/tricks of the trade
to yield interest, profit etc/to exhale (Buddhism)
to show respect for/to think highly of
